definitions.definition: An ancient Mesopotamian writing system, adapted within several language families, originating as pictograms in Sumer around the 30th century BC, evolving into more abstract and characteristic wedge shapes formed by a blunt reed stylus on clayen tablets.
A wedge -shaped bone, especially a cuneiform bone .

main_definition: An ancient Mesopotamian writing system, adapted within several language families, originating as pictograms in Sumer around the 30th century BC, evolving into more abstract and characteristic wedge shapes formed by a blunt reed stylus on clayen tablets.
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) A wedge -shaped bone, especially a cuneiform bone .
